siteMetadata.subtitle: Personal quick tips for Web Developers
siteMetadata.title: Quick Dev tips by Anubhav Srivastava

markdownRemark.html:
This is a series of libraries and utilities for building Command-line-interfaces aka CLI using Node.js and ecosystem around it. Similar utilities/helpers may be available for other languages but, these series is focused on JavaScript and its friends.

You can check all articles under CLI Build Tool tag.

frontmatter.description: Series of libraries and utilities for building Command-line-interfaces aka CLI using Node.js
frontmatter.title: Tool of the Trade for CLI Apps
